Title: —The Last Book—
Content:
In this era of electronic reading, even the remote Civil Town has quit using paper books and newspapers—except madman 'Fenster,' a well-known weirdo who always holds a worn-out book that he treasures. Due to his crazy behaviors, even the youngest kids in town refuse to stay away from him.

Everyone in town enjoys making fun of Fenster. All they need to do is tell him that they're interested in his book, and Fenster will introduce it to them in great excitement until his mouth goes dry. Then, they will laugh together at this crazy man, leaving him alone with his day dream.

According to Fenster, he can see the dream world described by the book and that is the unique magic of paper books. However, in people's eyes, Fenster is just a mad man having illusions. But his behaviors have drawn the attention of town doctor Quince. In order to include Fenster in his research, the doctor tells everyone that as long as he cures Fenster, he will be able to receive a grand prize in the field of medicine, which will be the honor of the whole town as well.

The crazy nobody suddenly becomes the rockstar of the town. The whole town sticks together and forces Fenster to accept Quince's treatment. They confine Fenster and burn that old book before him.

Out of everybody's surprise, Fenster breaks free and reaches out to save the book. He gets burned all over in the end and becomes hardly recognizable. In his moment, they see that Fenster is beyond redemption, so they leave him alone and move on to looking for another patient they can trade for honor. The next day, Fenster is missing, leaving behind a note that claims he has found the path to the dream world of the book and is already there.

Some say Fenster was having an illusion before death. Others doubt that the world he said might exist. Nobody knows where he went or if he's still alive. The Civil Town's last book disappears along with him. All they can expect is the arrival of another crazy guy.

Title: —Eventually, Robots Have Their Own Planet Too—
Content:
Robert was a companion robot that almost got retired for it had failed a quality examination due to missing parts. Before it got recycled, the family couldn't let go of it and decided to step in. They signed an agreement to acquire Robert's ownership rights and made it stay with them. Robert then witnesses the growth of the kid of the family. Due to its defect, Robert is not able to help its little master to learn, but the little master always tells every story she heard to Robert.

The little master has great enthusiasm for astronomy, telling Robert about one galaxy after another. Lives in the universe can be divided into groups by planet with different creatures living and prospering on their home planet. Meanwhile, each planet has a dominate species who determines the direction of the planet's civilization development. On Earth, it's human beings. On Oceanana, it's sea creatures. On Foresta, it's plants... It seems that every species can find a planet belongs to it.

"What about robots? Is there a planet for us too?" Robert asks awkwardly. Due to its worn-out speaker system, it takes him some time to finish.
"I don't know—we have no evidence of a planet like that so far." The little master waits patiently for Robert to finish and answers its questions carefully, as always.
"But just because there's no evidence doesn't mean there is no such planet! Perhaps it's too far away. Perhaps it hasn't grown up yet."
"Robert can wait until someone discovers it. Robots lives way longer than humans. Robert can surely make it until that day."
"When that day comes, Robert can live in a place full of robots."
"Robert doesn't want to go there. Robert is fine staying at home."
"Humans have short lives. After we are all gone... it will be Robert's home."

Robert doesn't understand. Why would its masters be gone one day? Is it because they will scrap it just like the recycling station guys? However, it doesn't bother Robert much as long as it gets to stay with this family a few more days before that.

Later, the little master grows up, ages, and dies. Robert realizes that instead of "getting scrapped," humans "die." After the entire family pass away, the government recycle the house and properties. Robert begs the officers to keep everything as it is for it will always stay here.

"Robots have no rights over the property." The officers tell this little old robot.
"Then let me have that album. Only that album. I want to record everything I remember about this family on it. Please."
"You should have records in your storage device. That'll be enough. Only civilizations have the privilege to memories. You robots don't have such thing."

How could it be? Robert remembers how the family laughed, cried, and every moment it spent with them. But the little master said only "records" leave traces of existence, so Robert doesn't insist. Instead, it embarks on a journey to look for civilizations. Civilizations—Civilizations—

If Robert found a civilization of his own, would he finally have the right to record his memories?

Because of this, Robert waits and waits. It tries to optimize its performance and meets friends who want to join it. Years later, they finally find a planet with no civilization at all and settle down on it. No one will chase them away or take away their rights. Robert can finally record all the memories about that family.

Eventually, robots too have their own civilization.
Eventually, robots too have emotions.
Eventually, robots too have a planet that belongs to them.

Title: Food Feedback Form
Content:
Customer Comment: Don't you Akdilek people have anything else to eat besides grilled meat and flatbread? And could you please pay attention to the shape of your grilled meat... Ugh! Just thinking about it makes me want to throw up my lunch!
Restaurant Response: We sincerely apologize for the poor dining experience. We are committed to providing every customer with authentic Akdilek cuisine and helping them understand the unique charm of Akdilek culture. Whether it's the food presentation or the plating style, we adhere to the principle of 100% faithful restoration of Akdilek customs and traditions on the ground. We deeply regret that our inadequate service has caused your unsatisfactory dining experience, and we extend our sincere apologies once again. We hope that Akdilek culture will meet you in a better form in the future.

Customer Comment: The hummus goes very well with the free yogurt from the restaurant—highly recommend!
Restaurant Response: Thank you for your love and support!

Customer Comment: I kept hearing that Akdilek food is delicious, but now I tried it, and it got be so angry that I couldn't help but laughed. I mean, it's just heavy spices mixed with chunks of meat—what's so special about that? Not even a single green vegetable, completely unhealthy. I'm speechless.
Restaurant Response: We apologize for the poor dining experience. Taste has no absolute standard—what suits your palate is what matters, but please don't disparage Akdilek cuisine even if you don't like it.

Customer Comment: The grilled meat is so good I'm literally crying. You're totally missing out if you don't try the grilled meat here!!
Owner's Reply: Thank you for your love and support! If you're satisfied with our service, could you please change your negative review to a positive one?

Title: The 4th Bionic Mechanical Exhibition—A Dance of Natural Soul and Steel Flesh
Content:
The 4th Bionic Mechanical Exhibition sponsored and supported by the Copperfield family will have its grand opening this Wednesday in Babylonia's Commercial District.
This exhibition has invited twelve leading mechanical manufacturing companies and labs to jointly design three exhibition halls themed history, safety, and future. These halls showcase the past and present of bionic machinery, the antiviral safety of bionic machinery, and the development prospects of new bionic machinery respectively.

"Four Key Highlights" 
1. The gathering of industry leaders. Miss Emma, representative of the Copperfield family, will lead the attendance at this exhibition, exchanging future cooperation directions and technical experience with top industry titans.

2. The debut of cutting-edge technologies. New bionic organ-driven exoskeletons and bionic giant miner blueprint will be unveiled for the first time at this exhibition.

3. Immersive Interaction. Visitors can wear a bionic gill device to dive into a virtual ocean, or simulate controlling multi-legged machinery to conquer a Mars terrain sandbox model.

4. Night light gala. During the exhibition, bionic firefly formations will light up the night sky every evening, demonstrating the romantic resonance between machinery and art.

Tap the link below to make a reservation
Join Copperfield in embracing the technological future!

Title: Coffee Divination
Content:
Super simple but effective coffee divination technique. Just two cups of coffee and you can complete a reading.
Step One: Order two cups of coffee based on today's mood. Step Two: Silently contemplate on today's fortune, then drink half of the coffee on your left, followed by half of the coffee on your right. Step Three: Based on your feeling, find the corresponding option below for the answer.

[Taste Getting Bitter and Bitter]
This indicates that your fortune today is poor. It's not advisable to go out or spend money. Please return home quickly to calm your mind and avoid further trouble.

[Taste Getting Sweeter and Sweeter]
Congratulations! Your fortune today is excellent. It's not advisable to go out and socialize actively.

[Taste Remains Unchanged]
Your fortune today is average. It's recommended to go out, but don't stay out too long.

[Can't Taste Anything]
This should be taste deterioration. It's recommended that you order two more cups of coffee to taste, or request coffee without milk or sugar to stimulate your taste buds.

Title: A Tale of Su Zi Pickled Vegetables
Content:
Su Zi pickled vegetables tops the side dishes rankings in A Bite of Kowloong, making it a beloved delicacy known in every household throughout Kowloong.

According to "Kowloong Cuisine," there was a Kowloong ancestor named Su Zi who delighted in fine food and sweet drinks and excelled in culinary research. One day, Su Zi obtained a rare book and was overjoyed beyond measure. He read through the night, not sleeping until the first light of dawn.

However, Su Zi became so absorbed in reading that he forgot to eat, leaving the food he had prepared the previous night untouched. In the evening of the next day, Su Zi tasted it and surprisingly found that it tasted more delicious than anything he had ever tried. He then repeated the process, intentionally letting vegetables pickle overnight before eating. This is the story behind the renowned Su Zi pickled vegetables.

Title: Asparagus Cultivation Methods and Considerations
Content:
Soil Requirements: Prefers warm and humid environments. Likes sunlight, tolerates partial shade, but fears direct strong light. Please use the sandy loam soil provided by the Science Council and ensure the weather system data in the transplant area is adjusted to the recommended parameters.
Care Method: Asparagus has fleshy roots and fears waterlogging, so daily watering should not be excessive. Fertilize regularly during the vigorous growth period. Babylonia's Endangered Plant Management Department will uniformly arrange watering and fertilization for all registered vegetation. Please do not care for plants yourself.
Propagation Method: Asparagus propagation mostly uses the division method, requiring comprehensive consideration of season, temperature, growth years, and plant size. If you have propagation or division needs, please report to Babylonia's Endangered Plant Management Department, and professional staff will assist with the process. Do not do it by yourself.
In case of questions, please contact Babylonia's Endangered Plant Management Department.

Title: Communication Guide and Social Crisis Observation Manual
Content:
Social Crisis Episode 3: Occasions for Apology
Now that you've learned how to communicate sincerely, but what is the right occasion to apologize?

Key Point One: The Right Time
A time that makes both parties feel comfortable and relaxed can ease negative emotions and help you better convey and understand each other's feelings.
For example, during the artificial sky's dawn-dusk transition period, the artificial weather system adjusts the main lighting to twilight mode, creating gentle illumination and a comfortable ambient temperature.
If needed, you can access the weather system's simulated atmospheric optical logs to check simulation dates for different sunset types. Rainbow sunset, cirrus cloud sunset, and dramatic fiery sunset are all excellent choices.
Please express your apology and feelings in a comfortable and relaxing atmosphere.

Key Point Two: The Right Place
A location suitable for private conversation that isn't crowded or noisy can help both parties think independently and face each other sincerely.
Babylonia's cafes, bookstores, and green areas with natural plants as barriers are all private spaces. If you choose a rare vegetation transplant area, you might even have the chance to hear chirping insects, flowing water, and other white noises that mimic the natural environment on the ground.
Rumor has it that the Endangered Plant Management Department is planning to transplant a genetically modified medicinal plant whose caffeic acid can oxidize and release light energy under luciferase catalysis, producing a soft cold glow. If successful, it will likely spark a new photo-taking trend.
Without the interference of noises, please face the issue bravely and sincerely resolve the misunderstanding and conflict between you.
Of course, most importantly, remember what we've learned before—don't fear communication, don't fear responsibility, don't be stingy with promises, and always trust each other.
Finally, here's to our success!

Afterword
According to books from the Golden Age, humans are inherently social creatures, building our civilization through communication and cooperation.
People live within the relationships they forge with one another, and these bonds subtly nurture humanity in return, shaping the world around us.
We have surrendered our lives to war's uncertainty. Beyond flesh and honor, the only thing that remains is what makes this world beautiful and what makes it absolutely impossible to abandon—something that binds all existence together, allowing breath, heartbeat, electromagnetic fields, and consciousness to achieve resonance.
It possesses tremendous power, yet remains restrained and gentle.
It drives us to seek life or embrace death, to communicate and connect, to save and sacrifice, to grasp another's hands and draw close to another heart.
We give it a name—"love".
The lost song from the Golden Age sing thus—in the end, the love you receive will equal the love you have created.
Let's raise our glasses to this! In this age, blood still runs warm and algorithms remain gentle.

Title: Communication Bulletin

Today, search and rescue CUBs have located the supply crate of the support squad that went missing during a surface Mission.
All members of the unit have been confirmed KIA. Construct Lilina's frame is still undergoing recovery procedures.
We deeply mourn our fallen comrades and thank them for everything they sacrificed for human civilization.
We will meet again at a higher place.
A collective memorial ceremony will be held at Dominik Memorial Plaza in five days.

Title: Military Discipline Supervision and Management Committee
Content:
Official Notice on Handling Results and Penalty Decision Regarding the Malicious Assault and Brawl Incident in Area No. 4596, Sequence Square
Commercial District, Babylonia
Administrative Punishment Decision No. [E-02-4596] 269
Violator: Tris
Unit Belonged: Engineering Force
Details: Violator Tris, female, active duty member of the Engineering Force.
Investigation reveals that during off-duty hours, the violator had an argument with victim Rudolf due to a misunderstanding in the public area of [Babylonia Sequence Square], subsequently using an unauthorized weapon (verified by the military discipline supervisor as an illegally modified sonic screwdriver) to assault and verbally abuse fellow soldier Rudolf and causing damage to the bulletin board.
The above facts are substantiated by evidence including the victim's statement, the violator's statement and defense, on-site surveillance footage, and other evidence.
In accordance with the provisions of Article 43, Section 2, Item 1 of the Military Law, it is hereby decided that the parties involved, Tris and Rudolf, shall be suspended as a disciplinary warning.
In accordance with the provisions of Article 21, Section 8, Item 15 of the Active Duty Military Personnel Service Regulations, the primary offender and violator is sentenced to three calendar days of community service "reception and guidance at the Activity Center".
In accordance with the provisions of Article 3, Section 2, Item 1 of the Special Administrative Zone Military Facilities Protection Law, the primary offender and violator is sentenced to severe warning as punishment.
Enforcement Department: Military Discipline Supervision and Management Committee Commercial District Branch
This file is prepared in triplicate: one copy each for the violator, the enforcement department, victim Rudolf, and Gestalt database for electronic archiving.

Title: Babylonia - Elite Lounge Holographic Guide
Content:
Welcome back to your haven. On the long journey to reclaim Earth, a comfortable resting place is key to keeping you in tip-top shape.

Lounge Functional Areas Overview
1. Rest Area: Designed to give the Commandant the most efficient recovery.
Vital signs are monitored in real time and adaptively adjusted to your condition, ensuring every rest restores maximum vitality.

2. Workstation: An extension of the Commandant's mind and thought. The Tactical Terminal connects directly to military headquarters, giving the Commandant instant access to the latest intel.
Independent comms channels ensure smooth battlefield command, order transmission, and squad contact. The Smart Workstation is your core platform for strategic planning.

3. Living Quarters: Stocked with supplies, this is the foundation for maintaining the Commandant's long-term combat readiness.
The living quarters are equipped with a smart beverage machine that prepares drinks based on your biometrics and taste preferences. The circulation cleaning system keeps your personal space clean and comfortable.

...
Within the dormitory, the logistics department has prepared all sorts of essentials. May this space be your strongest support and warmest home.
